Basically, the design of the app is transient and created dynamically based on the exact need of the moment

attachments.text:
Attached: 1 image

Spent the evening building a commandline tool for funsies that takes a text prompt, sends it off to GPT-3.5, and then compiles and runs the output code directly as an app. It uses SwiftUI as an intermediary, and since most SwiftUI output from GPT is iOS-specific it uses the Mac Catalyst runtime to more-accurately render results. Not hard to imagine a future where LLMs don't write the software, they *are* the software — with contextual UI generated on the fly. (I don't intend to make this public)
